reviews.text: Good, clean and tidy motel. Friendly hosts. Also a couple of friendly cats and dogs.
reviews.title: Convenient, clean and tidy motel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This motel looks a bit dispiriting from the outside, but the friendly professionalism of the managers makes it a good place to stay. Our room was large, clean, well cared for and comfortable. We did a load of washing in the shared laundry at v reasonable cost, and wished we had time to sit in the very nice garden.
reviews.title: Good place to stay, in spite of appearances

reviews.text: We have stayed at the Jade Court three separate times and it is always a nice experience. We like the back units and enjoy the large room with kitchen. Free wireless internet makes doing business while at the motel easy. The hosts/owners are always helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: Very nice place to stay
